title: Deep Space Music Suite 01
description: Music to evoke the feel of deep space exploration
longDescription:
Ten tracks designed to complement games with an outer space theme. Tracks range from heavy hitting drums to accompany action sequences, through to slow moving synths to evoke a sense of peaceful emotion.


Demo can be found here: https://youtu.be/T05raOhDyj8


Track 01: Deep bass and rhythmic drums for interplanetary action.

Track 02: A rhythmic heartbeat combines with aggressive bass for slow but heavy drama.

Track 03: Heavy distorted drum sounds make up the bulk of this action-packed track.

Track 04: Fast and entirely percussive.

Track 05: Heavy bass and a slightly slower pace.

Track 06: Based on the pulse of a heartbeat, prominent bass and soaring pads tie this together.

Track 07: Aggresive and heavy throughout, this song accmpanies action.

Track 08: Soft chimes and gentle rhythms make this a calm meander across a peaceful planet.

Track 09: Ominous horns and slow drums make this a sombre march to war.

Track 10: Gentle and airy, this is a calm and peqceful sound.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 42:51

Supported Development Platforms:
